params.text: Linda Fortune (the woman in white), former resident of District Six, walks on the empty space where her home used to be. Flags have been placed to mark their coordinates.
The book ‘The House in Tyne Street’ authored by Linda Fortune, an ex-resident of District Six.
Motala’s student can be seen surveying the land to find the exact coordinates of Linda’s home.
